name: ANTIGOLF
description:
Welcome to ANTIGOLF. A stylish and clever "golfing" puzzle game.

In ANTIGOLF, the goal is to NOT put the golfball into the hole. This concept seems simple enough... but it can be stretched pretty far. 

Thanks to my sister for helping me with a lot of the art for this game!

Instagram: @jay_capricious

I am very happy with the core mechanics of this game, and am looking forwards to adding new levels in the future. This is my first game jam, and my first "completed" project ever, so any feedback you have is highly appreciated. 

I hope you enjoy ANTIGOLF!

-Michael Barba

(Mouse is recommended for gameplay)
